markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expeditious Advance](/Feats.aspx?ID=920) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Lion Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=22)

**Prerequisites**
[Lion Blade Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=917)

**Requirements**
You are unarmored or wearing light armor.

</column>

---

You advance and retreat quickly. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your speed.
name: Expeditious Advance
requirement: You are unarmored or wearing light armor.
requirement_markdown: You are unarmored or wearing light armor.
